install.name: Community Builder
install.author: ARTIO s.r.o.
install.description: Adds SEO support for Community Builder component.

param.name: ignoreSource
param.label: Ignore multiple sources
param.description: You can choose to override the default behaviour of this option.

param.name: itemid
param.label: Itemid handling
param.description: You can choose to override the default behaviour with your own Itemid.

param.name: overrideId
param.label: Override Itemid
param.description: Itemid to always use with this component. Leave blank to use the default one.

param.name: addtitle
param.label: Add menu title
param.description: Controls when the Community Builder's menu title should be added to URL.

param.name: addsuffix
param.label: Add suffix to profile link
param.description: If set to No, suffix won't be added to profile links.

param.name: customNonSef
param.label: Custom non-SEF variables
param.description: Here you can specify custom non-SEF variables separated by semicolon.
